attributes.action: A bill to announce that no one in the present parliament can stand again for parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In veiw of the outrage of the expense debacle ,and in veiw of Members of Parliament blaming everyone and everybody but themselves for what has happened ,it is time now that the present people sitting in that parliament be stopped from standing again , and will ensure a complete closure to this. The public have no trust in these parliamentarians and this is the only way these people will listen.
